1.title: City of Pilots

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: The world is under siege from a terrorist organization group known as the Mussokilap, desperate for a solution the government decides to activate Project: New Age.

2.title: City of Mussokilap

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: With Project: New Age active, the Mussokilap desperate for a solution they decide to capture the test subjects but something goes wrong.

3.title: City of Pain

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: With the Mussokilap's main operation headquarters cleared out, the test subjects decide to take refuge and set up their own base of operations. Painfully ruining the Mussokilaps plans.

4.title: City of Loepahj

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: With the test subjects spreading across the horizons, discovering survivors from a previous battle with the Mussokilap. They then recruit them knowing that they do not have Project: New Age in them.

5.title: City of Alcohol

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: When Mathew discovers Samantha Harrington lying on the road, he brings her to Dr. Trent. Only to find out she was suffering memory loss from memory blackouts due to alcohol abuse.

6.title: City of Murder

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: In this slightly peculiar episode, the viewer finds themselves emerged in this slightly more abnormal take on City of Fire.

7.title: City of Revenge

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Finding out that the leader of the Mussokilap murdered her father, Irene seeks to take revenge, and avenge her father.

8.title: City of Betrayal

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Now knowing Irene is a sleeper agent for the Mussokilap, Samantha Harrington has to make hard decisions to determine who she can trust to be on the team, or not.

9.title: City of Refuge

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: After a gruesome battle with the Mussokilap, the team then takes refuge on a hidden island underneath Loepahj.

10.title: City of Reflection

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: After discovering the ability to travel through reflected surfaces, Thomas starts to experience the first of his side effects.

11.title: City of Infiltration

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

11.plot: With the team in high defense, they move to the Mussokilaps new main headquarters. A long battle awaits them.

12.title: City of Fire: Part 1

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

12.plot: Part one of the epic showdown between the team, and the Mussokilap.

13.title: City of Fire: Part 2

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

13.plot: Part two of the epic showdown between the team, and the Mussokilap.

14.title: City of Bloopers: New Egg

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

14.plot: In this Amazon Video exclusive, viewers can witness funny bloopers, slip ups, and jokes. With funny gags. - and lots of eggs.

-1.title: City of the Seven Suns

episode of.title: City of Fire: New Age (TV Series 2018– )

-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: 17 teenagers are selected for a secret military project, new age. A women known as Samantha travels through time, not by a machine. But but cryogenically holding herself for years, from every year she travels too she finds the most suitable, capable, and physically fit for the.. Experiment. The plan was to find teenagers who were smart and strong, basically to find the best teenagers in history. Then, they would bring them back to 2029 to stop a terrorist organization from destroying the planet. Before it happened. So she gathered 17 of the smartest, fastest, and strongest teenagers to ever exist, all ranging from 14-17 years old. The reason for this was for them to get enough training so by the time the organization was at its peak, they would be ready. So then, the teenagers were then - submitted to project new age, a mix of chemicals that would heighten there capabilities to super human levels. Before they could even breath the teens were then frozen miles into the earth in a facility owned by the government. But then, with no way to defend themselves they were taken by the Mussokilap, the terrorist organization they were made to destroy. So, hundreds of years in the future the Mussokilap was trying to replicate the serum. Without removing the teens from the cryogenic state. Then, without warning one of the scientist that were extracting samples from one of the subjects accidentally woke one of the teens. Only to find that the serum didn't only make them smarter. There are side effects, some of them are horrifying and painful. Others, might just give the teens the tools to save the world - or end it.
imdb.title: City of Fire: New Age
akas: City of Fire: New Age (United States)
plot: 17 teenagers are selected for a secret military project, new age. A women known as Samantha travels through time, not by a machine. But but cryogenically holding herself for years, from every year she travels too she finds the most suitable, capable, and physically fit for the.. Experiment. The plan was to find teenagers who were smart and strong, basically to find the best teenagers in history. Then, they would bring them back to 2029 to stop a terrorist organization from destroying the planet. Before it happened. So she gathered 17 of the smartest, fastest, and strongest teenagers to ever exist, all ranging from 14-17 years old. The reason for this was for them to get enough training so by the time the organization was at its peak, they would be ready. So then, the teenagers were then - submitted to project new age, a mix of chemicals that would heighten there capabilities to super human levels. Before they could even breath the teens were then frozen miles into the earth in a facility owned by the government. But then, with no way to defend themselves they were taken by the Mussokilap, the terrorist organization they were made to destroy. So, hundreds of years in the future the Mussokilap was trying to replicate the serum. Without removing the teens from the cryogenic state. Then, without warning one of the scientist that were extracting samples from one of the subjects accidentally woke one of the teens. Only to find that the serum didn't only make them smarter. There are side effects, some of them are horrifying and painful. Others, might just give the teens the tools to save the world - or end it.::Sterling Leon
